children.name:
AssertionError: Failed to update user 1: 429
assert 429 == 200
 +  where 429 = <Response [429]>.status_code

AssertionError: Availability 50.00% below SLA threshold of 99.9%
assert 50.0 >= 99.9

AssertionError: No successful requests with large payloads
assert 0 > 0

tests.conftest.SchemaValidationError: 'job' is a required property

Failed validating 'required' in schema:
    {'$schema': 'https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema',
     'type': 'object',
     'properties': {'name': {'type': 'string',
                             'minLength': 1,
                             'description': "Updated user's name"},
                    'job': {'type': 'string',
                            'minLength': 1,
                            'description': "Updated user's job title"},
                    'updatedAt': {'type': 'string',
                                  'format': 'date-time',
                                  'description': 'Last update timestamp'}},
     'required': ['name', 'job', 'updatedAt'],
     'additionalProperties': False}

On instance:
    {'name': 'Partial Update', 'updatedAt': '2025-09-29T22:47:22.318Z'}
